issue.title: [CF 977] [WOW 6.0 - Beta] Error when loading
issue.body:
I am not sure if its viable to post tickets for WoW 6.0 - Beta, but I will go ahead and post it :P

What steps will reproduce the problem?
Just install TMW, change Interface, X-Interface, X-Compatible-With at TellMeWhen.toc to 60000 and Interface to 60000 at TellMeWhen_Options.toc. When you log-in you get the following error. Note that its a clean installation with no icons at all.

``` Message: ...re\Conditions\Categories\PlayerAttributes_config.lua:225: 'for' limit must be a number Time: 07/24/14 12:36:16 Count: 1 Stack: ...re\Conditions\Categories\PlayerAttributes_config.lua:225: in function <...re\Conditions\Categories\PlayerAttributes_config.lua:224> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5> (tail call): ? ...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:529: in function `InitializeAddon' ...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:644: in function <...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:636> [C]: ? Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3527: in function `LoadOptions' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3132: in function `UpdateNormally' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3303: in function `Update' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1876: in function `?' ...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147: in function <...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147> [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4> [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?' ...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:92: in function `Fire' ...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:120: in function <...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119> Locals: <none> ```

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TMW 7.0.2-10-ga9e6ff3


> Posted by CurseForge user mOOwalker | Imported from CurseForge issue #977 | Raw

comments.body:
Please use the warlords versions of TMW: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/repositories/warlords/files/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
